name: Dreamland
text:
This card gains these effects depending on the Extra Deck monster card types (Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz) of monsters on the field.
â—? Fusion: Once per turn, if a monster(s) is sent from your hand or field to the Graveyard by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can draw 1 card.
â—? Synchro: When a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned (except during the Damage Step): You can increase the Level of that monster(s) by 1 (even if this card leaves the field).
â—? Xyz: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Destroy the face-up monster(s) on the field with the highest Level (all, if tied).
You can only activate 1 "Dreamland" per turn.
